# lastModifiedDate

**Instance Property**

The calendar date on which the media library was last modified.

## Declaration

```swift
var lastModifiedDate: Date { get }
```

## Receiving notifications when the user’s library changes

- **beginGeneratingLibraryChangeNotifications()**: Asks the media library to turn on notifications for whenever the library changes.
- **endGeneratingLibraryChangeNotifications()**: Asks the media library to turn off notifications for whenever the library changes.
